properties.name: 2008 Palm Beach H3 Football Hash
properties.description: Posted by Teflonwillie   Date: Sunday October 12, 2008, 11:00 am Location: Nurse GoodBody & Yeast\'s House in Palm Beach Gardens Its the 2008 Football Hash ! 11:00 am, , bring your pool toys and towels ! 11:30 hare away for a ~3 mile trail in *runnable shiggy* followed by Dolphins vs Texans football game, beer, food, pool, beer, NFL action, beer ! Directions: I-95 to PGA Blvd Palm Beach Gardens, WEST exit, turn right (north) on Military Trail, go just short of 2 miles, turn right at the entrance to The Isles - Victoria Falls Blvd. At the 2nd traffic circle, go left onto St Lawrence, follow it around to the back of the neighborhood, turn at the first right - James Bay Rd, 4th house on the right #1406 *OR* FROM THE TURNPIKE: Exit at PGA Blvd in Palm Beach Gardens, go east to Military Trail, follow directions above rest of the way Go Dolphins !

properties.name: 9/22/2008 Monday Wildcard Equinox Hash
properties.description: Posted by Teflonwillie Wildcard Equinox Hash (A Naming) September 22, 2008. Happy Hour 6:14p.m. Hares away at 6:44 p.m. Cum one, Cum all!! VIRGINS FREE!!!!!!! Erections to Doral, Florida (about 2-minutes from the Florida Turnpike exit): If cuming from the north, find the Florida Turnpike and drive south to exit 29 GET OFF, thence turn left and drive east toward civilization, this is 41st Street/Doral Blvd. (On the right side you’ll see a Navarro’s Drug store). Make a right on 114th Ave. If you went past McDonald’s you went too far!! Almost immediately make another right turn into the strip mall THEN an immediate turn left UP THE RAMP. Free parking on the second level. Look for vivacious and boisterous hashers. If cuming from the south, drive north on the Florida Turnpike and GET OFF ON exit 29, thence turn right and drive east toward civilization, this is 41st Street/Doral Blvd. Make a right on 114th Ave. (If you went past McDonald’s you went too far!!) Almost immediately make another right turn into the strip mall THEN an immediate turn UP THE RAMP. Free parking on the second level. Look for vivacious and boisterous hashers. Hares: Careless Cum Shot & NFHN Freddy Cost: Virgins - Free!!! Virgin Dicks - .00 All others: - (What does that get you, a few cold ones at the beer ck.) Bring happy hour frosties! Wear Black and White attire. Bring lights and whistles. ON AFTER across the street behind the Hampton Inn and Suites. They serve food and drink. Low shiggy. 2-4 mi. Dog and cow friendly. Walkers welcome. Questions: 305 401-0398, the suicide hotline.

Lauderdale Full Moon hash start location will be from South East 16th Street behind the SouthPort Shopping Center in Ft. Lauderdale FLA, USA. properties.name: Miami H3 9/18/2008
properties.description: Posted by Teflonwillie  5813 Ponce De Leon BlvdRing of Fire hares the Miami H3 Date: Thursday September 18, 2008 Time: 7:00 pm - 11:00 pm Author: kkate89 Type: Appointment When: Thursday, Sept. 18 Where: Titanic Brewery (5813 Ponce De Leon Blvd - Coral Gables) Cost: Happy Hour: 7:00pm Hare Away: 7:30pm Trail is A-B, with B being Titanic, so you\'ll end up at your car. Trail is moderate in length and low-moderate shiggy. Stroller, dog and blade friendly. Even unicycle friendly if you got one. Transportation to start location from Titanic is provided. IMPORTANT – since transportation to start is provided you’ll want to get there before 7:30pm. If you are running late (Belly dancer and Jamaica mi horney) give me a call so I know you’re on the way – 917-714-6885. Since it is getting dark earlier these days please plan appropriately. Flashers are always good, but anything that gives light will help...you’ll want it. Cost of the hash is , that includes your transportation to the start, beverages before, during and after the hash and snacks at the circle. On after at Titanic!! NOTE: Parking in Univ. Miami commuter lots (marked by a sea shell I think) after 4pm is free. There are also meters if you’d like to pay. D’erections from the north – Take I-95 south, it will turn into US-1. Follow US-1 south to Red Road (57th Ave) and take a right. Take another right (shortly thereafter) onto Levante Ave. and follow until it dead ends into San Amaro Dr. (2 blocks). Look for screaming hashers on your right and you’re there. From the south – Take US-1 to Red Road (57th Ave) and take a left. Take a right (shortly thereafter) onto Levante Ave. and follow until it dead ends into San Amaro Dr. (2 blocks).

properties.name: Rastashona
properties.description: Posted by Teflonwillie County Line Road at NW 12th Ave. MiamiWild Card Hash Monday, 9-29-08 RastaHASHanah Oy vey, mon! Hares: Jamaican Mi Shofary with Belly Dancer Monday 9/29/08 Bring flashlights, the autumnal eqinox is behind us! Hares Away 6:46pm Pack away 7:01pm You will be chasing the pack running unpleasantly alone in the dark if you are much later than this. Start Location: County Line Road at NW 12th Ave. (This is about one mile NE of Dolphins Stadium in Miami Gardens, FL on the Dade/Broward county line) Specifications: ~3.5 to 4 miles, not bike or blade compatible, doggie doable - but bring a leash or a very well-healed canine. BYOB for pre-lubrication and for the circle and for the on-after. There is a Winn Dixie 6/10th mile east of the start on county line rd. Cost: .69 gets you beer stop, JewishJamaicanJuice (rum stop), water, sugarfree vanilla Dr. Pepper, and at the on-after: grilled beef & non-beef hot dogs, hot coals for your other BYOGrillables. Special: If any hasher wears a rastafarian prayer shawl, then all hashers get a 69 cent discount, making the actual cost . The on-after will have a swimming pool and a grill. (at least until we are evicted) Bring a swimsuit & towel and food and grillable items other than hot dogs if so desired. Winn Dixie is 6/10th mile east of start. E\'rections: Turnpike to Dolphins Stadium/NW 199th St exit. (exit 2x). 199th St east about 1.5 miles to US441 (NW 2nd Ave). 441 north about 1 mile to County Line Road (215th St.). County Line Road west 8/10th mile to NW 12th Ave (sign here on south side of county line road reads: Berkshire at Walden Lakes apartments). Turn in left (south) onto NW 12th Ave. Take the almost immediate first right which leads into a cul de sac. Park efficiently along the curbed perimeter of the large cul de sac. I-95 from north to Hallandale Beach Blvd exit. West about 2 1/4 miles to US441 (NW 2nd ave). 441 south about 8/10th mile to County Line Road (215th St.). County Line Road west 8/10th mile to NW 12th Ave (sign here on south side of county line road reads: Berkshire at Walden Lakes apartments). Turn in left (south) onto NW 12th Ave. Take the almost immediate first right which leads into a cul de sac. Park efficiently along the curbed perimeter of the large cul de sac. I-95 from south can use Ives Dairy Rd exit. West to 441. North to County Line rd. Then same approach directions as above. Steve Alpers PO Box 80-1124 Aventura, FL 33280-1124 Peace and international cooperation, rather than war-mongering, unilateral invasions, and illegal spying on one\'s own citizens, display honest patriotism. Help find a cure for Mad Cow-boy disease.
